about_contents.title: Who We Are
about_contents.terms:
Anker was founded in 2009, the brainchild of a group of friends working at Google. Fast forward a few years and we’re now the industry leader in mobile power.

Our vision is to create a world where mobile truly means mobile. A world where nothing holds you back from where you want to go, or what you want to do.

Join us on the journey. Together we can create limitless, powerful possibilities.

about_contents.title: What We Do
about_contents.terms:
At Anker, we give people the power and freedom to enjoy life’s adventures. Our range of chargers and other accessories make sure you get the most out of your mobile devices.

Explore our product lines.
